type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. When dereferenced, it is encouraged to provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using  HTML [W3C.REC-html401-19991224]).

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

status.description: The HTTP status code ([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: An human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
